name: Sweetwater Aviation
about: At Sweet Aviation, we are dedicated to providing a comprehensive and enjoyable flight training experience. Our professional team of aviation experts is committed to delivering safe and fun training sessions, making aviation more than just a hobby or career, but a lifestyle. We offer world-class flight training using an ultramodern fleet of airplanes and helicopters, ideal for both aspiring pilots and those looking to rent or charter aircraft. Our state-of-the-art facilities and experienced instructors ensure that students receive exceptional training, whether they are pursuing a new hobby or a fulfilling career in aviation. With a focus on safety, professionalism, and personal attention, Sweet Aviation is your home for all aviation needs. We are here to help you cultivate your passion for flying in a safe and rewarding environment.
services:
["Annual Recurrent Training
Biennial Flight Review
Ground School
Instrument Proficiency Check
Intro Flight
Simulator
Time Building Programs"]
